tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE breach_notification (
    breach_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    breach_date TIMESTAMP,
    notified BOOLEAN,
    business_name TEXT,
    affected_records INT
);

CREATE TABLE breach_notification (
    breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    breach_date DATE,
    breached_data TEXT,
    notification_date DATE,
    notification_method TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE breach_report (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    breach_id INT REFERENCES breach_notification(breach_id),
    reporter_name TEXT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE data_breaches (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  breach_type VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  date_occurred DATE
)

CREATE TABLE breach_notifications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  breach_id INT FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES data_breaches(id),
  notification_sent BOOLEAN,
  date_sent TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE breach_audit_log (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  breach_id INT FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES data_breaches(id),
  action_taken TEXT,
  date_logged TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE data_breaches (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  breach_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  breach_date DATE,
  notification_sent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE breached_accounts (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT UNIQUE,
  breach_id INT,
  breach_date DATE,
  notification_sent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE breached_users (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT UNIQUE,
  breach_id INT,
  notification_sent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE breach_notifications (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  notification_id INT UNIQUE,
  notification_date DATE,
  notification_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE BreachNotification (
    breach_id INT,
    entity_name VARCHAR(50),
    breach_date DATE,
    notified_date DATE,
    breach_type VARCHAR(20),
    breach_description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (breach_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BreachedEntity (
    entity_id INT,
    entity_name VARCHAR(50),
    entity_type VARCHAR(20),
    entity_location VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (entity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE NotificationContacts (
    contact_id INT,
    contact_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(50),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15),
    PRIMARY KEY (contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BreachResponse (
    response_id INT,
    breach_id INT,
    response_type VARCHAR(20),
    response_details TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (response_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (breach_id) REFERENCES BreachNotification(breach_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BreachEvidence (
    evidence_id INT,
    breach_id INT,
    evidence_type VARCHAR(20),
    evidence_details TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (evidence_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (breach_id) REFERENCES BreachNotification(breach_id)
);
